Listing.description:
Step into comfort and style at 4732 W Dill Ave in the Martin Valley community. This spacious two-story home offers 5 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms across 2,204 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. The open-concept layout features a bright living room, dedicated dining area, and a modern kitchen equipped with a full suite of appliances, generous cabinet space, and a walk-in pantry. Downstairs includes a private bedroom with a nearby half bath and walk-in closet—perfect for guests or a home office. Upstairs, you’ll find four additional bedrooms including a spacious primary suite with a walk-in closet and en suite bathroom. An upstairs laundry room with hookups adds everyday convenience. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard ideal for outdoor lounging or entertaining, along with an attached 2-car garage and additional driveway parking. Located near N Curry Rd and W Woodruff Rd, with easy access to I-10, and just minutes from local shops and restaurants.
_____

Listing.description:
Welcome to 6481 Piccadilly Lane, a charming 1,508 sq ft smart-home nestled in the family-friendly Summerfield Park community of Orlando, FL 32829. This inviting one-story home features three spacious bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and a two-car garage. The freshly updated, all-white kitchen—with dishwasher hookups, refrigerator, electric range/oven, microwave, and a bright breakfast nook—flows seamlessly into the open dining and living areas. Modern convenience is built in with smart-home technology including a smart lock, smart thermostat, smart hub, and motion sensor, plus a dedicated laundry room ready for your washer and dryer. Outside, a private backyard offers a peaceful space for relaxation or play. Located just off S Hiawassee Rd and FL 435. Don’t miss your chance to make this wonderful property your new home—apply today!
_____

Listing.description:
** MOVE-IN SPECIAL: FIRST FULL MONTH & A HALF FREE + LAST MONTH RENT FREE - APPLIES TO 12 OR 15-18 MONTH LEASE TERM! (VALID JULY 2025) **
Welcome to 124 Taverners Ln! This stunning property offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and community charm. Boasting 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms spread across 1679 square feet, this newly built home is sure to impress. Step inside to discover a gorgeous open floor plan, highlighted by a modern all-white kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast counter. The spacious dining area provides seamless access to the expansive yard and tranquil lake, perfect for enjoying outdoor gatherings and leisurely moments. Retreat to the primary bedroom, complete with an attached bathroom and a spacious walk-in closet, offering a serene sanctuary for relaxation and rejuvenation. Two additional bedrooms share a nice full bathroom, providing ample space for family members or guests. Convenience is key with an attached garage and washer dryer hookups, ensuring ease and efficiency in daily living.
Outside, residents can take advantage of charming community amenities, including a park, children’s playground, dog park, covered pavilion, picnic tables, and grilling area, fostering a sense of community and connection among neighbors. Ideally situated just outside of Fuquay-Varina, residents will enjoy easy access to a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, enhancing the overall quality of life. Immerse yourself in the modern comfort and community charm of this newly constructed residence. Schedule a viewing today and make this your new home!
12 OR 15-18 Month Lease Terms Available; Please Inquire with Leasing Associate. _____

Listing.description:
Updated photography will be forthcoming. Please call with questions.
Tri-Level townhouse now available in the Bay Ho area of Clairemont.
Located less than 4 miles from the beach, this condo is perched on a hill offering ocean views right from your living room, along with countless beautiful sunsets. This unit features dual primary suites, each with its full bathroom, plus an extra half bathroom conveniently located off the living room. The kitchen has been upgraded with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, and it also includes a temperature-controlled wine cooler. You'll find ample storage space in the two-car garage and throughout the unit, along with a full-size washer and dryer located in the garage. ''Washer and dryer are available for resident use but not guaranteed; the owner is not obligated to repair or replace them." Enjoy brand new dual-pane windows and fresh paint throughout. Take advantage of community amenities like a pool, hot tub spa, 2 racquetball courts and a charming clubhouse. Close to Mission Bay Park and Tecolote Canyon for outdoor recreation, and to the new Trolley Station, with access to I-5 and 52 freeways. Apply today to make this wonderful property your new home! _____

Welcome to 2276 Sandcastle Way! This stunningly designed residence in the heart of Spring Branch features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, offering a spacious living area of 1328 square feet. Step inside to discover a generous living space adorned with a charming red brick fireplace, abundant natural light, and a delightful kitchen that includes a breakfast bar, granite countertops, wooden cabinets, a pantry, access to the backyard, and beautifully updated appliances! The primary suite boasts a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom equipped with dual vanities and a standalone shower/bathtub combination. Additionally, this home has a backyard accessible from the kitchen, ideal for weekend BBQs or simply unwinding. Located just a short drive from shopping, dining, parks, and schools, with convenient access to I-5! Come join us for a tour of your new home!

Welcome to a lovely home at 405 Stoneybrook Dr., featuring 1340 square feet of living space, with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It has a stunning exterior that features elegant brick cladding, and a well-kept lawn with lush greenery. Enter the charming living area and be greeted by a cozy decorative fireplace, and ample space for leisure and entertainment. The stylish kitchen, which features naturally polished wood cabinets with enough storage space, beautiful worktops, and updated appliances, making daily cooking a delight. All bedrooms are nicely-sized, offering a tranquil ambiance. Washer/dryer hookups included for added convenience. Listing.description:
Welcome to 4122 Alexander View Dr, a stunning 3-story corner townhome offering 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms across 1,887 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space. Situated in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood within a highly sought-after school district, this home is ideal for those looking for comfort, convenience, and modern upgrades. Inside, you'll find a spacious open-concept layout with a bright living area, motorized blinds, and a well-appointed kitchen featuring a large center island, electric range oven, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator—perfect for both daily living and entertaining. The upper levels offer generously sized bedrooms and multiple full bathrooms, providing flexibility and privacy. Additional features include a laundry area with washer and dryer, an EV charging port in the attached 2-car garage, and attic storage. Enjoy the benefits of being a corner unit with sizable front and side yards—ideal for outdoor enjoyment. Located just off Providence Road with easy access to NC-51, you're only minutes from the Arboretum, Strawberry Hill, shopping, dining, and major roadways. This home is a rare find in a prime location—schedule your tour today! _____

** MOVE-IN SPECIAL: FIRST FULL MONTH & A HALF FREE + LAST MONTH RENT FREE - APPLIES TO 12 OR 15-18 MONTH LEASE TERM! (VALID JULY 2025) **
New Atherstone community. Newly built homes. Discover this charming 4-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom property on 265 Royal Meadow Dr. This newly built home is sure to impress. Step inside to discover a gorgeous open floor plan, highlighted by a modern all-white kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and a convenient breakfast counter. The spacious dining area provides seamless access to the expansive yard and tranquil lake, perfect for enjoying outdoor gatherings and leisurely moments. Retreat upstairs to the primary bedroom, complete with an attached bathroom and a spacious walk-in closet, offering a serene sanctuary for relaxation and rejuvenation. Three additional bedrooms share a nice full bathroom, providing ample space for family members or guests. Convenience is key with an attached garage and washer dryer hookups, ensuring ease and efficiency in daily living.
As part of the Atherstone community, residents have access to fantastic amenities including a park, children’s playground, dog park, covered pavilion, picnic tables, and grilling area, fostering a sense of community and leisure. Positioned just outside of Fuquay-Varina, this residence offers easy access to plenty of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, ensuring that you're never far from the action. Immerse yourself in the modern comfort and community charm of this newly constructed residence. Schedule a viewing today and make 265 Royal Meadow Dr your new home! *Note, some photos are staged, the unit is unfurnished - Call with Any Questions!

Listing.description:
Welcome to 4101 Black Canyon Dr! This lovely home features 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, offering a spacious living area of 2079 square feet. The open floor plan showcases laminate flooring throughout, a modern kitchen equipped with granite countertops, wooden cabinets, and plenty of storage space, including a pantry and a breakfast bar with seating. It has all the conveniences to make cooking enjoyable, such as stainless steel appliances. The formal dining and living areas are illuminated by porthole lamps, filled with natural light, and painted in soft tones, creating a relaxing atmosphere after a long day. The primary bedroom is carpeted and includes a walk-in closet, along with an attached bathroom that features a single vanity and a standalone glass door shower. The backyard is a nice size, fully fenced and landscaped, complete with a covered patio perfect for relaxation or entertaining. Additional security and storage are provided by the smart lock and attic. This home is conveniently located near a variety of shopping options, restaurants, parks, and schools! We invite you to join us for a tour of your new home! _____
RENT WITH MYND -Fast Online Application (valid for 30 days) -Mobile App to Pay Rent and Track Services -Affordable Renter's Insurance -Most internet providers charge $80-$120/month for gig speed internet. Through our partner Second Nature, we’ve negotiated a lower rate of $67.49/month for gig speed internet, which comes with the property and is available upon move in. Get more details when you apply.
Lease term: 12 months
ONE-TIME FEES Non-refundable $59.00 Application Fee Per Adult One Time Move In Fee $199
REQUIRED MONTHLY CHARGES* $2345.00: Base Rent $39.95/month: Residents Benefits Package provides residents with on-demand basic pest control, as-needed HVAC air filter delivery, Identity Theft Protection, and access to an exciting rewards program
*Estimated required monthly charges do not include the required costs of utilities or rental insurance, conditional fees including, but not limited to, pet fees, or optional fees. See our website for more information: https://leasing-faqs.stonly.com/kb/en

You can reach us directly at leasing@mynd.co, or call 512-229-9099, or text 737-315-3750 for more information.

Listing.description:
Welcome to 6325 N Aloha Sue St, a beautifully updated 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom home offering 1,962 sq ft of thoughtfully designed living space. This two-story gem features an open-concept main level with a fully equipped modern kitchen, sleek stainless-steel appliances, and a large island that flows into the dining and living areas—perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, you'll find a versatile loft, a laundry room with hookups, two spacious bedrooms with a shared full bath featuring double sinks, and a luxurious primary suite complete with a walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom. Smart home features like a smart lock, thermostat, motion sensor, and hub provide modern convenience and added peace of mind. Outside, enjoy a private, a backyard and a two-car garage. Ideally located just off W Centennial Pkwy and Camino Eldorado Pkwy, with easy access to I-15 and nearby shopping, parks, and schools—this home combines comfort, technology, and location in one fantastic package. Don't miss out on this wonderful opportunity!
_____

Listing.description:
Experience the perfect blend of space, style, and convenience at 823 W St Kateri Ave in Phoenix. This impressive 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home offers a thoughtfully designed floor plan ideal for comfortable everyday living and effortless entertaining. The open-concept layout features a spacious living and dining area that flows seamlessly into a well-appointed kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, electric range, and garbage disposal. Upstairs, the generous bedrooms include a large primary suite with a walk-in closet and private bath, providing a peaceful retreat from the rest of the home. Step outside to enjoy the fully fenced backyard, perfect for pets and outdoor gatherings, while the attached two-car garage offers covered parking and added convenience. Laundry is a breeze with in-home hookups, and with nearby parks, schools, and shopping centers just minutes away, everything you need is within reach. Located in a desirable neighborhood near Desert Breeze Community Park and Vineyard Estates, this home offers easy access to major roadways for a smooth commute. Don’t miss out on making this spacious and inviting home yours—schedule a tour today!
_____
